value.title: DAX Fridays! #66: TREATAS
value.excerpt: In this video we will go through the DAX function TREATAS.  The TREATAS DAX function allows us to create virtual relationships within tables or pass filters to tables that are not related.  Link to function in glossary:  https://curbal.com/blog/glossary/treatas-dax   Link to SQLBI blog post: https://www.sqlbi.com/articles/propagate-filters-using-treatas-in-dax/

value.title: Decompress gzip files using Power BI and get access to @EU_Eurostat data.

Most data is stored in gzip files and you need to know how to decompress gzip files to be able to get the data. I will show you two methods in this video. value.title: Monitor usage with Power BI audit logs
value.excerpt: You can turn on audit logs in Power BI to monitor what users are doing in Power BI. This tool is perfect for troubleshoot and to help you document what is being done in Power BI and use it to comply with laws like GDPR.  To turn it on, you need an E3 or E5 office 365 license.
